synopsis.text:
Motors and emotions intertwine in "Ano Hino Kokoro o Toraete," a captivating promotional anime by Hino Motors, showcasing their groundbreaking 'FlatFormer' technology. Nestled in a futuristic countryside, where technological advancements harmoniously blend with nature, the story unfolds.

Meet Ruuto and Michi, two inseparable childhood friends who share cherished memories in their hometown's sunflower fields. However, as the hands of time spin, their bond is tested when Michi relocates to an urban area during their junior high years. Desperate not to be forgotten, Ruuto clings to their connection, while Michi, unwilling to reveal her vulnerability, hides her true feelings.

As their paths diverge, the revolutionary FlatFormer bridges the gap created by time and distance. Witness how this innovative mobility service intertwines their hearts, transcending spatial boundaries, and rekindling their precious bond. "Ano Hino Kokoro o Toraete" beautifully illustrates a world where technology and emotions unite, offering a heartwarming tale of friendship and reconnection.
